arrowOffset.description: Arrow offset in px, 5 by default
arrowOffset.description_zh: 箭头偏移量（以 px 为单位），默认为 5

arrowPosition.description: Arrow position relative to the tooltip, side by default
arrowPosition.description_zh: 相对于工具提示的箭头位置，默认为 side

arrowRadius.description: Arrow border-radius in px, 0 by default
arrowRadius.description_zh: 箭头 border-radius （以 px 为单位），默认为 0

arrowSize.description: Arrow size in px, 4 by default
arrowSize.description_zh: 箭头大小（以 px 为单位），默认为 4

children *.description: Target element, must support ref prop and ...others
children *.description_zh: Target 元素，必须支持 ref prop 和 ...别人

closeDelay.description: Close delay in ms, 0 by default
closeDelay.description_zh: 关闭延迟（以毫秒为单位），默认为 0

color.description: Key of theme.colors or any valid CSS color, controls tooltip background, by default set based on current color scheme
color.description_zh: theme.colors 的键或任何有效的 CSS 颜色，控制工具提示背景，默认基于当前配色方案设置

defaultOpened.description_zh: 不受控制的工具提示初始打开状态

disabled.description: If set, tooltip element will not be rendered
disabled.description_zh: 如果设置，则不会呈现 tooltip 元素

events.type: { hover: boolean; focus: boolean; touch: boolean; }
events.description: Determines which events will be used to show tooltip, { hover: true, focus: false, touch: false } by default
events.description_zh: 确定哪些事件将用于默认显示工具提示 { hover： true， focus： false， touch： false }

floatingStrategy.description: Changes floating ui position strategy, 'absolute' by default
floatingStrategy.description_zh: 更改浮动 ui 位置策略，默认为 'absolute'

inline.description: Must be set if the tooltip target is an inline element
inline.description_zh: 如果工具提示目标是内联元素，则必须设置

keepMounted.description: If set, the tooltip will not be unmounted from the DOM when it is hidden, display: none styles will be applied instead
keepMounted.description_zh: 如果设置，则隐藏时不会从 DOM 中卸载工具提示，而是应用 display： none 样式

multiline.description: Determines whether content should be wrapped on to the next line, false by default
multiline.description_zh: 确定是否应将内容换行到下一行，默认情况下为 false

offset.description: Space between target element and tooltip in px, 5 by default
offset.description_zh: 目标元素和工具提示之间的间距（以 px 为单位），默认为 5

onPositionChange.description_zh: 当工具提示位置更改时调用

portalProps.description: Props to pass down to the portal when withinPortal is true
portalProps.description_zh: 当 withinPortal 为 true 时传递给门户的 props

position.description: Tooltip position relative to target element (Tooltip component) or mouse (Tooltip.Floating component)
position.description_zh: 工具提示相对于目标元素（Tooltip 组件）或鼠标（Tooltip.Floating 组件）的位置

positionDependencies.description: useEffect dependencies to force update tooltip position
positionDependencies.description_zh: useEffect 依赖项强制更新工具提示位置

radius.description: Key of theme.radius or any valid CSS value to set border-radius, numbers are converted to rem, theme.defaultRadius by default
radius.description_zh: key的 theme.radius 或任何有效的 CSS 值来设置 border-radius，数字默认转换为 rem，theme.defaultRadius

refProp.description: Key of the prop that can be used to access element ref, ref by default
refProp.description_zh: 可用于访问元素 ref 的 prop 的 key，默认为 ref

transitionProps.description: Props passed down to the Transition component that used to animate tooltip presence, use to configure duration and animation type, { duration: 100, transition: 'fade' } by default
transitionProps.description_zh: 传递给 Transition 组件的 props，用于为工具提示框的存在添加动画效果，用于配置持续时间和动画类型，默认为 { duration： 100， transition： 'fade' }

withArrow.description: Determines whether the tooltip should have an arrow, false by default
withArrow.description_zh: 确定工具提示是否应具有箭头，默认情况下为 false

withinPortal.description: Determines whether tooltip should be rendered within Portal, true by default
withinPortal.description_zh: 确定是否应在 Portal 中渲染工具提示，默认为 true
